messages.message:
I'm trying to spin up a new Crafting sandbox (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/weimingwu?cw=dev) and it's stuck at
```Connecting to Instabase cluster crafting-aihub under namespace intes-use2-crafting-aihub-instabase```
Any fixes?

hey, I see your linked sandbox is getting deleted -- do you have another one I could take a look at? this should have been resolved earlier today and I have not yet been able to replicate it on my own host :upside_down_face:

Yep I just created this one:
https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/weimingw?cw=dev

kk I'm able to see where it's hanging
```owner@dev:~$ sudo kill -9 $(pgrep cs)
owner@dev:~$ cs k8s intercept start --reset --ingress-disable-auth --namespace intes-use2-crafting-aihub-instabase --infra crafting-aihub --ingress crafting-aihub:service/intes-use2-crafting-aihub-instabase/service-server-nginx:443
Fatal: rpc error: code = FailedPrecondition desc = conflict: version out-dated: 182aa0fd3bcd6059.
owner@dev:~$ cs k8s intercept start --reset --ingress-disable-auth --namespace intes-use2-crafting-aihub-instabase --infra crafting-aihub --ingress crafting-aihub:service/intes-use2-crafting-aihub-instabase/service-server-nginx:443
Updated! Name: weimingw Version: 182aa0fed8d9ca1d ID: cv5lq3l3j7uc738s2dhg
Traffic will be intercepted with ANY of the following headers:
  HEADER     VALUE                                
  baggage    crafting-sandbox=cv5lq3l3j7uc738s2dhg
  tracestate crafting-sandbox=cv5lq3l3j7uc738s2dhg
Waiting until interception is ready (Ctrl-C to stop waiting at anytime) ...
WORKLOAD FEATURE         TARGET         STATUS   
dev      Cluster Network crafting-aihub Â» Pending```
still figuring out why it's stuck in pending, will update as soon as I have something

able to unblock it with the following, but I'm not sure whether interception is busted still
```% rm -f /home/owner/.sandbox/setup && sudo kill -9 $(pgrep cs) $(pgrep workspace) && cs k8s intercept stop && cs k8s intercept start --reset --ingress-disable-auth --namespace intes-use2-crafting-aihub-instabase --infra crafting-aihub --ingress crafting-aihub:service/intes-use2-crafting-aihub-instabase/service-server-nginx:443```
It still doesn't seem to be working - only webpack is running
yeah that's because I had to skip force it to skip past the other image builds and interception initialization
I'm not sure why it's having such a hard time, I can't even get it to start interception with a clean env
